review: When this thing works, it's rather amazing. I've been using it to watch Netflix, YouTube videos, and Twitch streams on my living room television.The problem is... it doesn't always work.In the past few days, there's been quite a few issues tied to this piece of technology. It's rather frequently forgetting the network it's connected to or rebooting at around 11PM CST for no real discernible reason I can see. Just now, it's stopped detecting the remote control itself that CAME with the unit. These are pretty annoying aspects of the Fire TV Stick which make me say to any future buyers to wait a little bit until some of these bugs fall out.That being said, installation was a breeze and it is very handy when these issues don't come up to interrupt your viewing experience.
author: Mike Schumacher

review: Well, what canI say?  I pre-ordered this in October and when it arrived I was very excited.  It was easy to install and seemed to work just fine in the beginning.  It started to act up January 10th 2015.  I contacted  Amazon and told them that the movies were cutting off in the middle and that it was asking me to reconnect to the Internet or that the connection was lost, yet all my other electronics and Internet were working.  They told me to hit the pause/play key and the center button and that it should re-start the first stick.  Well, it did.  It worked for a movie or two then started to act up again.  Long story short, I had to call four times before they replaced just the stick, not the accessories.  Amazon was helpful, but I found out later that you should be talking to engineering not tech support, like that made a difference.. It did not.  I received the new stick yesterday and it has already started happening again.  It cut off in the middle of a movie and said that my internet connection is lost.  It was not.. I don't know if I will be keeping this or if I will start looking in to getting Apple TV.  I have been a loyal customer of Amazon for years and I appreciate all the new additions it has made over the years.  However, I am deeply disappointed in the way the are handling the issue with Fire TV.
